    • Why Vidiyo

    • For all
      We noticed that fans who have resources and confidence were able to get autographs and pictures while the shyer fans did not want to bother the celebrities and therefore missed out. We are the resource for those fans.
    • Human connects
      With Vidiyo, We decided that we wanted to create a simple pleasure, honest and fair way for fans and celebrities to connect.
    • Technology first
      With the technology and systems that we have created, we believe that we have achieved this and much more.
    • Sometimes, it is personal
      By using Vidiyo, Now fans who have already got an autograph and have met their favourite celebrity, they can now get a 'Personal Video Message' that they can keep forever.

    About

    We believe in delivering happiness to those who deserve them, and work closely with a variety of charities which believe in changing the world and make it a better place. By using Vidyo, you are contributing to bringing smiles to those who need it.
